overview: Circus Summarum is a musical magical circus show for the whole family.  Here are beautiful songs, hazardous air numbers, poetry, crazy clown numbers and fun surprises.  Meet all the friends from DR Ramasjang - Bamse, Bruno, Hr. Sk√¶g, Motor Mille, Kristian from Ramasjang Mysteriet and Rosa from Rouladegade.  The show is filled with dancing and music provided by beautiful dancers and a real circus orchestra consisting of DR Big Band.
title: Cirkus Summarum 2014
